policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === ***  THIS POLICY IS READ ONLY ***"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === Required changes can be implemented in policies in the 'Customizations' folder "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === The policies within that folder will have the same name as this policy but "/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === either prefixed with '#' or suffixed with 'Extensions'"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === Prefixed policies can be used to overwrite variables of this policy"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === Suffixed policies can be used to extend functionality"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === If you find you cannot add your customizations using the policies in the 'Customizations' folder"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be found and should be used as 'Encapsulated Assertion'!"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="TUFD"/>
                <L7p:Enabled booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_token_type"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Default (BEARER)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5vYXV0aDIudG9rZW5fdHlwZX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_token_type"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Server type"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Configure the type of token that should be issued. MAG supports 'BEARER' only"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="aHR0cHM6Ly8ke2dhdGV3YXkuY2x1c3Rlci5ob3N0bmFtZX06JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5wb3J0fQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="host_oauth2_auth_server"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvYXV0aG9yaXpl"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_auth_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvdG9rZW4="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_token_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvaW50cm9zcGVjdA=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_introspect_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvdG9rZW4vcmV2b2tl"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_token_revocation_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvdG9rZW4tcmV2b2NhdGlvbi1saXN0"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_token_revocation_list_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvYmMtYXV0aG9yaXpl"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_backchannel_authentication_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvZGV2aWNlLWF1dGhvcml6YXRpb24="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_device_authorization_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvZGV2aWNlLXZlcmlmaWNhdGlvbg=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_device_verification_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvaGVhbHRo"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_health_check_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2F1dGgvb2F1dGgvdjIvcGFy"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_par_authorization_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Server Auth Server"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Configure values related to the authorization server"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Please review the values below and configure them to your needs"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Match the hostname that will be used by oauth clients"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5LmNsdXN0ZXIuaG9zdG5hbWV9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_server_hostname"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Match the name of the cert that is used when SSL connections are made with oauth clients. The name has to match the value in 'Tasks - Manage Certificates'"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5LmNsdXN0ZXIuaG9zdG5hbWV9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_server_certificate"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Match the port through which oauth clients connect"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5wb3J0fQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_server_port"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Set the url prefix if a prefix has been used when these policies were installed"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_server_url_prefix"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Default (false)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5leHBvc2VfY2xpZW50X3NlY3JldH0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="expose_client_secret"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5lbmFibGVfYW5vbnltb3VzX2NsaWVudF9leHBvcnR9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="enable_anonymous_client_export"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Modify the value below ONLY if the path has been modified"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2Nvbm5lY3Qvc2Vzc2lvbi9sb2dvdXQ="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="usersession_logout_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L29wZW5pZC9jb25uZWN0L3YxL3VzZXJpbmZv"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="userinfo_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2Nvbm5lY3Qvc2Vzc2lvbi9zdGF0dXM="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="usersession_status_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L29wZW5pZC9jb25uZWN0L2p3a3MuanNvbg=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwks_uri_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L29wZW5pZC9jb25uZWN0L3JlZ2lzdGVy"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oidc_register_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="L2FwaWRvY3MvYXV0aC9vYXV0aC92Mi9zd2FnZ2Vy"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="service_documentation_path"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="The content below will be added to the configuration export JSON message as is"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="Im9hdXRoX2RlbW9fcHJvdGVjdGVkX2FwaV9lbmRwb2ludF9wYXRoIjoiL29hdXRoL3YyL3Byb3RlY3RlZGFwaS9mb28iLA0KIm1hZ19kZW1vX3Byb2R1Y3RzX2VuZHBvaW50X3BhdGgiOiIvcHJvdGVjdGVkL3Jlc291cmNlL3Byb2R1Y3RzIg=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="export_custom"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Cache Lifetime for JWT as client credential can be modified in the customizable policy"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Default (1800)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5jbGllbnRfY3JlZGVudGlhbC5qd3QuY2FjaGVfbGlmZXRpbWVfc30="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_credential_jwt_cache_lifetime"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Default (60)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5qd2tzLmxvb2t1cF9jYWNoZV9saWZldGltZV9zfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwks_lookup_cache_lifetime"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="JWT specific variables"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hY2Nlc3NfdG9rZW4uZW5hYmxlX2p3dH0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="access_token_enable_jwt"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Audience specific variables"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// enable intended audience check"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hY2Nlc3NfdG9rZW4uZW5hYmxlX2ludGVuZGVkX2F1ZGllbmNlX2NoZWNrfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="enable_intended_audience_check"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="Hashing variables"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// hashed secret algorithm"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5oYXNoZWRfc2VjcmV0LmFsZ29yaXRobX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="hashed_secret_algorithm"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// hashed secret enable"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5oYXNoZWRfc2VjcmV0LmVuYWJsZX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="hashed_secret_enable"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// hashed secret salt"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5oYXNoZWRfc2VjcmV0LnNhbHR9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="hashed_secret_salt"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Comment stringValue="mutual TLS authentication"/>
            </L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// enable thumbprint validation"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5vYXV0aDIubXRscy5lbmFibGVfdGh1bWJwcmludF92YWxpZGF0aW9ufQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="oauth2_mtls_enable_thumbprint_validation"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Default (60)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hdXRob3JpemF0aW9uX3JlcXVlc3Rfb2JqZWN0Lmxvb2t1cF9jYWNoZV9saWZldGltZV9zfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="request_object_lookup_cache_lifetime"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay50b2tlbl9yZXZvY2F0aW9uX2xpc3QuZW5hYmxlZH0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="token_revocation_list_enabled"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hbGxvd19wb3J0X2Fnbm9zdGljX3JlZGlyZWN0X3VyaXN9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="allow_port_agnostic_redirect_uris"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5hbGxvd19wb3J0X2Fnbm9zdGljX3JlZGlyZWN0X3VyaXN9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="allow_port_agnostic_redirect_uris"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5wZXJzaXN0X2Rjcl9zb2Z0d2FyZV9zdGF0ZW1lbnR9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="persist_dcr_software_statement"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5vcGVuX2JhbmtpbmdfZGlyZWN0b3J5Lmp3a3NfdXJsfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="open_banking_directory_jwks_url"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5lbmZvcmNlX2Rjcl9zb2Z0d2FyZV9zdGF0ZW1lbnR9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="enforce_dcr_software_statement"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// Default (3 seconds)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay50b2tlbl9lbmRwb2ludF9wb2xsaW5nX2ludGVydmFsX3N9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="token_endpoint_polling_interval_sec"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5vYXV0aDIuY2liYS5leHBpcmVkX2lkX3Rva2VuLmVuYWJsZWR9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ciba_expired_id_token_enabled"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// Default (5 seconds)"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5vYXV0aDIuY2liYV90b2tlbl9lbmRwb2ludF9wb2xsaW5nX2ludGVydmFsX3N9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="ciba_token_endpoint_polling_interval_sec"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="minutes"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Default (0); forever"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5vYXV0aDIuY2xpZW50X3NlY3JldC5saWZldGltZV9tfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="client_secret_lifetime_m"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="// allow oauth request params in query params"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:AssertionComment>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="ZmFsc2U="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="allow_insecure_oauth_params"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Export"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="Configure values related to the OAuth Manager client_id export feature"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:All>
